author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
Watch Louder with Crowder every weekday at 11:00 AM Eastern, only on Rumble Premium!

Arnold Schwarzenegger legally immigrated to the United States with nothing when he was 21 years old. He went on to build a career more successful than most people around the world could ever dream of. On top of that, he became the governor of one of the largest states in America.

An immigrant did that—a legal immigrant, in fact. And if that is not the American dream, I don’t know what is.

Still, it’s got to be frustrating for him when the lunatics on The View act like he should be lumped in with the group of criminal aliens the Trump administration is currently priori
title: The shrill harpies on "The View" are SHOCKED legal immigrant Arnold Schwarzenegger opposes illegal ones

author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
Watch Louder with Crowder every weekday at 11:00 AM Eastern, only on Rumble Premium!

Here in America, we’ve got this thing called “private property rights.” The government isn’t supposed to just take your land to fix some made-up problem. But in this weird, almost communist push to make affordable housing a “human right” — even though the government has no real power to control that — a farm in New Jersey is still fighting to hold onto what’s theirs against a completely baseless eminent domain grab.

A New Jersey Farm is fighting to hold onto its property
title: Remember the man whose 175-year-old farm was being seized for affordable housing? The Trump Admin is coming to his defense

author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
Watch Louder with Crowder every weekday at 11:00 AM Eastern, only on Rumble Premium!

There’s a reason Somalia does not have an illegal immigration problem, and there is a reason the United States does. And to claim that the former has a stronger democracy than the latter is a total lie that even those with an IQ of 24 would not believe.

This is what makes it so disingenuous and absurd that Rep. Ilhan Omar found the nerve to claim that not only is Somalia less of a dictatorship than the United States, but that it’s being "turned into one of the worst countries."

🚨NEW—Rep. Ilhan Omar, who was born in Somalia, says that the United States is being "turned into one of the worst co
title: Ilhan Omar attacks America (again), this time claiming we are the "worst country"

description:

Today, we’ve got the man himself — Border Czar Tom Homan. He’s here to fill us in on what’s going on with ICE, the border, and deportations.

One of the most misguided aspects of advocating for “no human illegal” is the kind of cruelty it ultimately encourages.

According to Homan, it's not really possible
title: Watch: Tom Homan UNLEASHED joins Crowder, "What Joe Biden did wasn’t incompetence or mismanagement — it was intentional"

author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
Watch Louder with Crowder every weekday at 11:00 AM Eastern, only on Rumble Premium!

“Investing in whites is not a crime,” said no one ever—because that would be racist. And you better hope no mayor ever says something like that to “put economic power directly in the hands of” people with the skin color he happens to prefer. That wouldn’t just be blatantly racist and a betrayal of the oath to represent all people equally—it would almost certainly be illegal, too.

Nonetheless, Chicago Mayor Brandon Johnson said exactly that. Just swap out “white” for a skin color closer to his own.

BREAKING: Chicago Mayor Johnson to hand out race-based grants to black residents as slavery repar
title: Chicago Mayor announces taxpayer-funded grants to citizens... but only if they're Black

author: Brodigan
description:
The Left once again advocates for a slave labor class in America. It didn’t work in the 1800’s. Not sure it’s going to work now. Today, we have him: the man, the myth, the legend. Border czar Tom Homan joins us for an update on ICE, the border, and deportations. Finally, President Donald Trump is losing his coalition over Iran. Or, not. Let’s take a look.

WITHOUT ILLEGALS, WHO WILL CLEAN THE TOILETS?

  • "Our Nation’s ICE Officers have shown incredible strength..."
title: 🔴 Watch LIVE! Border Czar Tom Homan Joins Crowder: Will Trump Actually Fulfill Deportation Promises?

author: Brodigan
description:
Watch Louder with Crowder every weekday at 11:00 AM Eastern, only on Rumble Premium!

When you have a sibling who grows up in the public eye, it's a coin toss if you want to emulate them or go in the opposite direction. For example, if you have an older sister who enjoys playing sports, you may also want to participate in sports. However, when your sister is an insufferable slacktivist like Greta Thunberg, the only alternative is to become a pop star. Meet Bea Ernman. Greta's sister, the singer.

— (@)
title: We just heard Greta Thunberg's popstar sister desecrate a Whitney Houston classic, now you have to as well

author: Brodigan
description:
Watch Louder with Crowder every weekday at 11:00 AM Eastern, only on Rumble Premium!

A rift has formed between a small portion of Donald Trump's coalition. Dating back to 2011, one of the major things Trump campaigned on was the fact that Iran could not get a nuclear weapon. Today, there are people who voted for him claiming that it isn't what they voted for, now that Israel is doing something about it, and Trump is letting them. One of the most vocal opponents of Trump staying out of Israel's way is Tucker Carlson... and of course, that doesn't sit well with the President.

We're all in agreement that no American soldiers should be sent
title: Donald Trump debuts new nickname for Tucker Carlson now that former Fox News host turned on him over Iran
